import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List all accessible workflows"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/workflows"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns workflows across all projects that the user has access to.
Optionally filter by project_id.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"project_id","in":"query","description":"Filter workflows by project ID","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"workflows":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["id","name","project_id"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"name":{"type":"string"},"project_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"jobs":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["id","name","body"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Job name"},"body":{"type":"string","description":"JavaScript code to execute"},"adaptor":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"NPM adaptor package name (e.g., \"@openfn/language-http@latest\")"},"credential_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Associated credential ID"},"inserted_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"title":"Job"}},"triggers":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["id","type"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["webhook","cron","kafka"],"description":"Trigger trigger (mutually exclusive with source_job_id)"},"source_job_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Source job (mutually exclusive with
